name: Scrollbars - Minimalistic
description: A minimalistic, less visible style for all scrollbars, for those who only use them to see how long the page is.

user.name: banthaz
user.about: I only test my styles using the latest stable Firefox version on Windows 7 with Aero theme. About the license CC BY 3.0: If you're on userstyles.org: Just mention my username ;) If you're somewhere else: Add a link to this page too

additional_info:
It should be noted that I don't use this myself anymore, but since it seems to work well – and with Firefox 4 – and it's still quite popular, I'll keep it up.
